ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.3_0: Then a certain lay follower approached the nun Thullanandā
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.4_0: “I hope you’re bearing up, Venerable, I hope you’re getting better?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.5_0: “I’m not bearing up, and I’m not getting better.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.6_0: “We’ll deposit a _kahāpaṇa_ coin in such-and-such a shop. Please get whatever you wish from there.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.7_0: Thullanandā then said to a trainee nun,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.8_0: “Go to such-and-such a shop and bring back a _kahāpaṇa_’s worth of oil.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.9_0: That trainee nun then brought those a _kahāpaṇa_ to such-and-such a shop and gave it to her.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.11_0: “I don’t need oil; I need ghee.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.12_0: That trainee nun went to that trainee nun and said,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.13_0: “It seems the nun doesn’t need oil, but ghee. Here’s your oil; please give me ghee.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.14_0: “Venerable, if we were to take back goods that have been sold, when would our goods be sold?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.15_0: When oil is bought, oil is taken away. Buying ghee, you receive that, and you’ll take that away.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.16_0: The trainee nun started to cry.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.19_0: That trainee nun told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.20_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.21_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā get one thing in exchange and then something else?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.22_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.25_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā get one thing in exchange and then something else?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.26_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.27_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.28.1_0: ‘If a nun gets one thing in exchange and then something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.6_0: Whatever she gets someone to buy
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.8_0: apart from that thing, if she gets something else in exchange, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.9_0: When he gets the robe-cloth, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.10_0: It is to be relinquished to the Sangha of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.11_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.13_0: ... ‘Venerables, this thing, which I got in exchange, having first got something else in exchange, is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.17.1_0: If it is something else and she perceives it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.18_0: If it is something else, but she is unsure of it, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.19_0: If it is something else, but she does not perceive it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.20_0: If it is not something else, but she perceives it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.21_0: If it is not something else, but she is unsure of it, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.22_0: If it is not something else, and she does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.23.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.24_0: if she gets both in exchange at the same time;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.25_0: if she demonstrates a benefit and then gets it in exchange;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.27_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.28_0: The fifth training rule is finished.
